entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
